Unlike, say, a subscription?

Steve Yates

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] ESU announcement coming?
metadata.email_text_original:
Unlike, say, a subscription? 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc. 
From: 'Charles F Sullivan' via PatchManagement
<patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 5, 2023 3:22 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] ESU announcement coming? 
" You may continue to use Windows 10 after support ends". Strange thing to say
in an article about EOS. Maybe it's that as opposed to self-destructing. 
On Tue, Dec 5, 2023 at 1:48 PM 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement
<patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/SN6PR08MB55174BFD4FE79CC2AE408769B784A%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com
